title: Chalet font - anything the same or very similar?
content:
This is a font called Chalet Book - anyone know of anything the same very similar? many thanks all. :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227021838im_/http:/typophile.com/files/chalet_example_3500.gif)
author: ichad

comments.content:
What’s wrong with it? You can get it at  
 [www.houseind.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227021838/http:/www.houseind.com/ "www.houseind.com")

Helvetica, Avenir, Univers… not _very_ similar…
Well, you can always look at the faces this family was inspired upon, like Helvetica, Univers, Folio, Unica et al, but you won't find any with the single storey italic _'a'_.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/paralucent/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227021838/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/paralucent/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/paralucent/")

Inspired by similar sources (I guess) with a single storey italic a but otherwise more ornate than Chalet.

Tim
Thanks guys! Went and bought the littlen from 'House Industries' in the end. :)
